hero.greeting: I'm Milan, a freelance fullstack developer.
hero.description: With a Master's degree and 3 years of professional experience, I offer my services as a freelancer to help you create, develop, and maintain your digital projects. Specialized in web and mobile development, I design high-performance, custom applications.

about.title: About Me
about.description:
Passionate about development for several years, I am now a freelance fullstack developer.

With 3 years of experience in a digital services company, I build robust and efficient web, mobile, and desktop applications. I work with modern technologies such as React, Vue.js, Symfony, Next.js, Flutter, Electron, TypeScript, and Python.
Familiar with Agile methodologies (Scrum), I can easily integrate into an existing team or lead your project from start to finish.

My goal is simple: to provide you with clear, effective, and reliable solutions that meet the real needs of your users.

ðŸ‘‰ Available for freelance work on both short-term assignments and long-term projects.
